forensic.name: Hey why didnt you say something You have a car phone
Ransomed
forensic.desc:
Halfway through building the challenge, I accidentally got infected with malware and the flag was encrypted, so I ended up using the encrypted file as the challenge instead.

Caution: Potentially malicious content for educational use. You are responsible for safe containment.

forensic.name: Sleeping Angel
forensic.desc: Uto is the cutest angel, but she seems to have fallen asleep. Could you wake her up? UtoB.png

forensic.name: Sleeping Angel Again
forensic.desc: Uto has fallen asleep again. Can you wake her up once more? SleepUto.png

misc.name: I AM A TREE
misc.desc: I planted a tree yesterday, and I named it "hey". You know what a tree has? branches and leaves !

misc.name: Message from Space
misc.desc:
Oh wait! Is there any alien coming?

We picked up something weird on an old frequency.
Some HAM operators claim they heard a faint "CQ CQ CQ..." in the static.

Maybe there’s more to this noise than it seems. Can you receive what they sent?

misc.name: OSINT 2
misc.desc: The flag is the official website of the organization where the photo was taken. Format example: CRHC{https://www.xxxxxx.xxxxxx.xxxxxx/}
